name: Golden Hot Chocolate
description: Rich, peppery, and that glowy, golden hue—we're talking about turmeric! Turmeric continues to make waves for its remarkable anti-inflammatory and health benefits, and our warming Golden Latte Mix is the most delicious vehicle for adding more to your diet. It’s super versatile, too—let this Golden Hot Chocolate recipe win you over.
preparation:
1. Warm milk and water in Multipurpose Pot over medium-high heat. Whisk in hot chocolate and latte mixes until well combined. Bring to a boil. 
  2. Remove from heat and stir in syrup. Pour into mug and sprinkle on toppings, if desired.
